mapper.sql: formatid AS formatId ,name ,start_trigger_0 AS startTrigger0 ,start_trigger_1 AS startTrigger1 ,start_trigger_2 AS startTrigger2 ,startline ,delimiter ,pos_date AS posDate ,pos_partner AS posPartner ,pos_amount AS posAmount ,pos_comment AS posComment ,fmt_date AS fmtDate ,fmt_amount_thousand AS fmtAmountThousand ,fmt_amount_decimal AS fmtAmountDecimal ,pos_partner_alt AS posPartnerAlt ,pos_partner_alt_pos_key AS posPartnerAltPosKey ,pos_partner_alt_keyword AS posPartneraltKeyword ,pos_credit_debit_indicator AS posCreditDebitIndicator ,credit_indicator AS creditIndicator
mapper.select: SELECT FROM cmp_data_formats WHERE formatid = #{id} LIMIT 1
